content.detailedDescription: Slightly smaller than a boeing 737 sized object headed due west at about mach 2 sidesteps oncoming commercial airliner over los angeles. i was sitting in my parked car outside my garage at around 8:50pm looking due north. silent high speed blinking red object traveling at about mach 2+ headed due west comes to a dead stop directly north of me and kills its red light completely at which time i lose visual sighting of it. a few seconds later it randomly blinks a triple side by side white lights and a single green, a single red and double side by side red blinking and solidly lit lights. it constantly kept killing all its lights at random erratic times while in motion and in a hover making me lose track of it in the sky. it was headed due west in a commercial airline air corridor. i ran out of my car due west down my driveway to visually reacquire it which i did only to lose it again as it kept randomly killing all its lights. i watched it sidestep an oncoming commercial airliner but the two were never really that close to a head on collision. the object took high speed right angle evasive action well in advance. visibility was unlimited with no wind in a cloudless black sky. i thought twice in my life back in 2013 was all i was ever going to see or i would have had my cell phone on me. now i know to be outside, just after dusk, when the sky is crystal clear, during the summer months, looking at the commercial air corridor with my damn cell phone in hand.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slightly smaller than a boeing 737 sized object headed due west at about mach 2 sidesteps oncoming commercial airliner over los angeles.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony enjoying the summer night and as i looked up i noticed two orbes slowly moving from the east to the west and then they disappeared after i took a picture and snap chatted. there were no planes or helicopters at the time just clear a clear sky. when i first noticed the ufos i thought to myself "no way is this really happening"? my feelings were that we are not alone and this is the coolest thing i've ever seen, afterwards i was hoping get they would come back.
content.summary: Red/ orange orbes ascending and disappeared out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription: Filmed three of five lights which seemed to coming from lake area and heading parallel with algonquin ave. there was no wind or breeze so for it to be chinese lanterns highly unlikely.
content.summary: A pair of lights flying in formation and then three single lights following same path minutes aparts

content.detailedDescription: #wow i was at on the second floor my apart in my room looking out to the west at night 10:58 p.M. friday night watching planes fly by with binoculars what made me notice first for both sightings was : i seen a a bright white light appear pulsate 2 times and reappear and disappear 2 times and then move across the sky for about 3 seconds and then disappear again and then i seen a second one this one pink red red pink appear 8 to 10 minutes later plink on and off pink and red and then i see it move across the sky in a staight for 25 seconds. my feels were of like i was very excited during and after i lost sight of the first white star like just appear and then disappear move across the black night sky for 3 seconds then disappear just a snap of my thumbs quick like and then second one i seen for more than 25 seconds then i got the idea to look at it outside with my binoculars and cell phone to shot a picture of the bright pink red big star-like object when i get outside running down stairs i was gone. thank you gonzalo
content.summary: Black star like shape appear for 3 seconds and move across the sky then 8 to 10 min a second on pink red the move for about 20 seconds

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of my garage to smoke a ciggarette. as i exited my garage, i noticed a green glowing object the size of a large car hovering above my neighbors house. it took off quickly going west towards the sunset. it stopped and began flying erratically. so i pulled out my cell phone and captured it on my camera for a few seconds before i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Hovered above neighbors house. took off quickly, short video after it took off

content.detailedDescription: Group of red-orange glowing lights bigger in size than a star fly over first colonial road in formation and then disappear. lights did not blink or flash or change colour. observer has knowledge of craft that fly in area and could not identify lights.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing lights in formation fly over virginia beach

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke at around 4:30am looked up and there was an object as described going right over my neighbors house a few feet away from east to west direction maybe about 50 kilometers per hour, not very fast, not very high maybe 100ft up. at first i thought it was an airplane because it was shaped like one however it looked a bit futuristic and the wings were small and didn't look light they could provide any lift then i though hey why is there no sound and the tip of the vehicle where the cockpit would be went into a cone shape towards the tip and the "cone" at the tip was glowing pure white... no airplane i know has these features. it went over me then over some trees when i realized i was seeing something special i ran after it to see it on the other side of the trees where its flight path would have been and it was gone. this is the second weird event in the sky at this residence, i had posted one here years back i would like to add.
content.summary: Futuristic dark colored airplane shape with small wings and a glowing pure white cone shaped nose

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting outside my balcony enjoying the evening wind. i closed my eyes and looked up to the sky. when i opened my eyes i saw a silvery object above in the sky which was just sitting there without moving. i thought it was a balloon at first but the reflection of the sun was making it shine real bright. i decided to look at it with my binoculars that were close by but i still couldn't tell the shape of it. i decided to take out my telescope which has an attachment where i can hook up my android phone since i like taking pictures of the moon and the planets once in awhile at night.
   the object began to move slowly and i was struggling to capture it through my telescope until i was finally able to get it on my phone. i began recording it once i got a hold of it. at first i thought it was balloons once again because it was three spheres that were attached to each other but they began to move in a circular motion and once in awhile the three spheres would separate from each other and come back together. so i ruled out balloons.
   the three spheres together formed a triangle shape and were bright yellow almost shining, i don't know if it was due to the sun hitting the object or what. the object would move around as if it was out of control but as it was moving in one direction it would suddenly move to another direction. at one point the object passed another white sphere like object which can been seen in the video but i was unable to stay with the other object or i would have lost the three sphere object.
   finally i was unable to track the object because the arms that make my telescope move were unable to move further and i lost the object. the sun was setting and clouds began to move in making it difficult to see the object any longer. the object was real high in the sky because it disappeared behind the clouds that were passing by and usually the planes that pass above my house from lax usually are real high in altitude and they don't even fly above the clouds. i was able to find another video on youtube from someone in cordoba, argentina who filmed a similar object back in may 2015.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 spheres yellow bright form triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of our rehearsal studio with my band mates.  i tried to get them to see the object but it was gone before they could see it.  it looked like a satellite appears, but much lower in the sky.  it was not flashing. there are many planes in the area, but it was not a plane.  no blinking lights.  just a bright white light like a star/planet.  it just seemed out of the ordinary.  not a plane or helicopter.  and the reason for my report is that as it travelled from left to right, it become very bright, at last 3 times brighter, then disappeared.  there were no clouds nearby.  just strange.
content.summary: Satellite like, but got super bright

content.detailedDescription: Late night swim with a friend, we were just talking we both decided to lay back and float to look at the stars. the night was very clear, out of the corner of my eye i saw something moving, i turned toward it and then saw 2 extremely bright (what looked like stars) moving across the sky very very fast. i asked my friend omg what is that??!!! she looked too. she saw the very same thing. then she says look there are 3 not 2. the 2 "stars" had a fainter "star" behind them moving just as quickly. i got out of the pool to grab my phone to video it. my phone would not pick up the "stars" we watched them over across the sky and stop. they hovered there for about 20 mins, then between the two brighter "stars" something fell out of no where. the falling object had no trail behind it, it was a fainter looking "star". we stood there watching the hovering "stars" for over 25 mins. when i grabbed my phone i noted the time. it was 3:14am. the object hoover to the west, just to the right of the moon but higher than the moon in the sky. the "stars" as they hovered there pulsated, slowly. then the one to the right would flutter blink, then become very very very bright. the 3rd fainter light stayed constant. i opened my sky map on my phone to help identify the "stars" they were not listed. the lights were positioned next to the lower right hand tip of the constellation libra and the very bottom of alphrad constellation. this was not a plane, it was to far away in the sky to be a plane, and it moved faster than a plane. and it stopped. i do not know what it dropped, but it was something. there was not a beam or trail when the object dropped from between the two bright lights. call me what you will. it was a ufo. we were speechless, absolutely speechless and shocked. im a believer point blank now. i know what i saw, i wasn't on drugs, i wasn't drunk. that was a ufo plain and simple....At first i was like omg what is that...Then i felt in awe, then when it drop something...I was a bit afraid. my friend said she felt like we were at war. we never lost sight of it. we both went home. i couldn't sleep last night, just thinking. we are not alone in this universe. we are not alone.....
content.summary: Late night swim with a friend, saw (at first) 2 extremly bright lights traveling extremely fast through the night sky, looked like two stars horizotally to one, then futher behind a fainter light all in a straight line. hovered then dropped something

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:15 - 10:20pm on friday, june 17, 2016, i was driving west on us rt. 50 between the rt. 47 on ramp and the south parkersburg off ramp.  i was almost to the off ramp, so my view at the time was hills on either side in front of me, with the sky and distant hills between them.  i was going about 60 miles an hour, and had the windows partially down.

all of a sudden, i caught something moving out of the corner of my eye, on the left.  it came from behind me (i assume, because i didn't actually see it behind me), and zoomed straight ahead.  it moved so fast, i don't think the whole event even took one second.  it moved in a straight line past me and directly between (or slightly over) the foothills i was heading towards.  then it disappeared.  just now you see it, now you don't.  it didn't keep getting smaller.  it was just gone.

i don't think it was a shooting star, because i've seen them before, and this appeared much closer and bigger.  and i'm sure at some point it was between the hill and me.  but i'd say it was probably a mile away when it disappeared.  

it happened so fast that even though my memory has a trail, i think that's just because my eyes didn't have time to adjust to the speed it traveled.  so the light just went past me.  but i remember seeing a circular flame or flame-colored light when it was almost to and at it's furthest point from me.

i was super excited!  i've been hoping forever to spot something in the skies!  i just hope it actually was what i think it was!  lol
content.summary: Fast moving light or fire.  it happened so fast i could not make out an actual vehicle.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend were walking back to our apartment after taking our dog on a walk and to the park. i looked up and thought. saw something in the sky... maybe balloons.. my boyfriend works at the dispatch center which is always notified when special events like that take place, there was not anything going on that day that could explain these objects in the sky so i recorded them. the objects were pretty stationary, hovered and moved slowly. i was feeling extremely curious so i posted the video on a facebook page that is for the town, we got many comments about the video, but none that could explain what we saw. we were the only people who saw these object, there were so other witnesses. we didn't loose sight we simply stopped recording and went home..
content.summary: Looked like balloons, but when zoomed in did not have any apprearce of balloons or lanterns.

content.detailedDescription: I have been taking many pictures of this bright light in the south east sky at night and this picture looked blank.  i just enlarged it and these faces i see clearly appeared before my eyes.  no one can explain this the reason i am asking mufon to look into it.  very scarey the longer i look at it!
content.summary: 3 distinct faces caught on my phone i could not see with naked eye.  by chance i enlarged it.

content.detailedDescription: At exactly 1:50am, the sound of like 100 motorcycles with the loud tailpipes awoke me from my sleep.  the noise was directly over the house.  the noise then moved east and began to dissipate, and i looked out the window to see a flashing red light, right at the top of the trees at the end of the road, take a sharp left turn then it was gone.  the noise also ended as soon as the light was out-of-sight; which doesn't happen by any man-made object, as you would normally hear the sound travel further along until well out of range.  at first, i thought it was indeed just a lot of motorcycles traveling along the road, as this is a loop during the day for joy-riders.  however, given the hour, and the fact that none were seen on the road, my sighting was confirmed by the visualization of the red light.
content.summary: Sound of like 100 motorcycles woke up then saw red flashing light travel along road path and turn sharply

content.detailedDescription: A military airforce base is near by. and i had photos of what looks like a worm hole, i saw helicopters, jets with contrails. it happens all the time over the area. i saw orbs, a silver aspirin shaped disc, lightning in the sky. ufos, all sorts of things. it is a hot spot for ufo by a military base in a city. there were aliens sightings day and night over the town.
content.summary: The military is nearby. happens a lot

content.detailedDescription: When we were all coming home and i looked up at the moon and noticed a red star or planet that was in the atmosphere.  i have a set of binoculars to looked at the red light.  looking at it changed shapes with lights and expanded like a balloon.  i then grabbed my camera ad recorded the event.  i was able to obtain the footage which i have included in the pictures. it was amazing to see it glowing and change shapes. the object is still in the sky within the horizon of the moon.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orb that changed colors and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was at the location and time as stated above. its not unusual for me to be outside looking up gazing at the stare with 7x50 binocs. i had just came out on the porch and was turning around to get n. i did not have the binocs in use. i noticed a very bight object moving at a high rate of speed, there were no sounds. while tracking this object s. another object was coming from s and behaving like the other one. i was certain there was going to be a collision but they stopped instantly. while i was trying to process this there was the third one.In the formation. i do not know where this one came from. as soon as all 3 were stationary they were gone heading w. all of this happened in no more than 1 second.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three very bright lights converging. elasped time was no more than 1 second

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my kitchen i looked up noticing a light , about the size of a pencil diameter ,come from about40 degrees, dropped straight down . traveling about 5 seconds then. moving due east for approx.8 seconds until obscured by trees  the following night the same occurance but at midnight
content.summary: Single bright orange object dropped by 5 degrees then turned 90degrees moving horizontolly to east , lost sight because of trees . out of our atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: During the phoenix lights i was walking the mountain preserve adjacent to my parents house.  i first noticed a large dim light moving from north to south.  i observed it for about 30 seconds then realized when it was overhead that it was one of 7 lights in formation.  the light was less luminescent than city lights but very large.  it was about the size of a football field at 500 yards away.  the light was circular.  the distance between the light overhead (which was the last in the series on the right wing) and the next towards center was about 5 times the circumference of the light overhead.  i saw 6 other lights, the last, on the left side was barely visible.  if the light directly overhead was 500ft in elevation than the width of the ufo ~3500yards?  the space between the lights looked solid yet seemed to refract light around it leaving blurry stars but seeming solid.
content.summary: Phoenix lights observer

content.detailedDescription: The object seemed to to just sit there no movement stationary in the sky west of me, i called several news stations to see if they pick up on it but as of now still sitting there still in the sky!!
content.summary: Two straight lights like a cigar shape

content.detailedDescription: Brigjt lite moving fast then disapeared
content.summary: Bright lite

content.detailedDescription:
On june 17h at 22h23 i was out on the patio observing the moon and planets.
suddenly a huge orange light appeared from east toward north-west. i had never
seen anything alike. the object looked round and was really huge. on top  was
 a hallo like form. it is difficult to determine the height because the sky was
clear with no reference to the clouds although an airplane passed a while
after and appeared higher that what i had seen. the object was moving fast,
no sound nor no trace were detected.  i searched for the iss orbit and determined it was
situated over sumatra  very far away from my city. for me this constitutes
a very mysterious phenomena since i have been an astronomer for years.
i never had time to grab my camera hence no pictures.
content.summary: Orange round light flying very fast, no noise, no trace behing.

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was in the front yard reclining in our lawn chairs watching the stars and enjoying the mild weather with my wife.
2) i noticed an object coming over the trees behind the house across the road.
3) i initially thought it was a plane.
4) the object was in the shape of an isosceles triangle. there were no wings/tail, no noise, no lights (blinking or landing lights that would indicate a plane/helicopter), and no exhaust/contrail. it moved in a straight line from southeast to northwest. the bottom of the object appeared to have a swirling feature to it 
5) i was surprised that an object could move that fast with no sound what so ever. i asked my wife if she could see it but she did not have her glasses on. i could not tell how high it was but it moved across the sky from 30 degrees elevation to the southeast, to almost directly overhead, and 30 degrees elevation to the northwest in 30 seconds or less.
6) i lost sight of the object as it headed to the northwest over the trees in the distance.
content.summary: I observed an isosceles shaped triangle moving from the southeast to the northwest moving extremely fast.  i did not hear any noise. the underside appeared to have a swirling pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family where driving through the witchita mtn. outside of lawton oklahoma. so i took my husbands cell phone and stared to take pitchers . one week later i was going through the photos that i took and notice something in the sky!! so i showed my husband and he said its a bug but the funny thing is its too big and it has distant to it. so can you please help with this photo and let me know what it really is thank you.
content.summary: Did see it in person until i was looking a the picters that i took !

content.detailedDescription: Someone told me to come on here and write a report as what i witnessed years ago was 110% not man made. i watched 10-12 objects go in a ne flight pattern for roughly 45 minutes. it looked as though they were flying at an altitude that would've been well higher than any altitude our commercial or military jets could fly. on top of that i could see them go faster, slower, and stop on a dime. i watched this for roughly 45 minutes and it honestly looked like they were playing with each other. the formation stayed in a single file line and never deviated from the line. i was in the marines and spent plenty of time on or near air bases. what was flying that night was nothing our boys have in the arsenal. the altitude was far too high and the stopping and going is not something our aircraft are capable of. it seriously looked like the craft were playing with each other out of boredom.
content.summary: Looked like they were playing with each other

content.detailedDescription: I was on the driveway at home. looked to the nw and noticed the bright red glowing object hovering about 30 degrees over the horizon. at first i thought it was a drone fitted with multiple lights. as soon as i noticed it, the object flew very quickly in a westerly-northwesterly direction and i lost it below some trees.I knew it was not a police helicopter searching because there was no sound and there was no recognizable fuselage, and it did not have any searchlight. what surprised me was the sudden acceleration away.
content.summary: Went out to take trash and noticed a bright red glowing object hovering then it quickly shot away to the nw.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i took my dog for a walk at approximately 8:30pm pst. my 7 y.O. daughter decided to tag along at the last minute. the skies were clear, little to no wind and the weather was warm for the evening. it was almost a full moon too. even though the sun had set, there still was a yellow and orange color on the horizon towards the west; towards the east the sky was black and dark blue. 

as we started walking south, i spotted a small star-like white object heading in the same direction. i could only view the object with my binoculars. i attempted to capture and record it on my samsung galaxy note 5 but due to the moon light and light pollution i was unable to do so. eventually i lost sight of it. my daughter did not see it either.

after this my daughter decided we should walk the dog around our neighborhood starting at the cul-de-sac towards the north end of our street. we walked over there and i was admiring the very last minutes of a beautiful sunset. the view here was less obstructed so i had a better view of the horizon to the west.

shortly thereafter, i noticed a white intense light moving from west to east. the light was heading straight for us. at first i thought it was an airplane but as it got closer, i still could not see any navigation lights. there was no sound coming from it as well. i started using my binoculars but all i could see was the white light.

once the object reached about 70 degrees above the horizon, i noticed what i thought to be the outline of a black triangle. the white light was coming from underneath it and the light appeared to be in the center. at this time i started to video record the object with my cell phone. almost at this exact same moment, my wife began calling me multiple times (western ringtone music in the video). i kept having to reject her calls to keep recording. my dog become agitated and my daughter was becoming worried too. this is the reason why the video is so shaky; i was dealing with all the above at the same time. in addition, we never heard any noise from the object, it was completely silent.

you could not see the outline of the black triangle with naked eye and the camera on the phone did not capture too. i was only able to observe it using the binoculars. i recorded the object as it flew directly overhead and as it started passing the moon. i had to stop at this point because the leash for my dog was wrapped around my legs and my daughter was upset. 

i lost visual contact with the object as it headed in a south east direction. the light began to flicker similar to a broken fluorescent bulb before it went completely dark.

i then walked home which is approximately 100-200 yards. once i got home, i learned my wife had spotted the object from our backyard. she was attempting to call me to see if i saw the object too. thankfully, she recorded the object from her position. attached are the videos from our cellphones, both samsung galaxy note 5 models.
content.summary: Strange white light

content.detailedDescription:
1)i was watching the mets game.  

2)i always see planes from jfk's flight pattern from my vantage point on the couch of my home....The lights caught my eye because they weren't from a plane....It was glowing redish orange and they were not blinking like those from a jet plane.  as they came overhead they were completely silent.  i observed 8 of them...It was when i saw the 4th one, i went inside and grabbed my cellphone to record the rest of them.  

3) i knew they were not planes.  i live by an airport, and like i said, jfk's flight pattern is over my house and i am intimately familiar with jets lights and how they blink.  there's the wing lights and the headlights...These objects didn't blink.  they glowed and pulsed and were redish-orange.

4) they moved very slowly...Much slower than a jet.  then again....I couldn't gauge how high they were because it was dark out, but they were under the clouds at the time.  they seemed to go in a perfectly straight line and controlled manner.  the two i have in one frame on video flew in a formation and never strayed from each other.  

5) i really didn't have a reaction other than i knew these were not airplanes or helicopters or anything that is currently known to man.  this is not my first ufo encounter either...I've seen silver orbs during the day before...I just never got them on cell phone.

6) i lost sight because they eventually went beyond camera and eyesight.
content.summary: 8 ufos witnessed and i have cellphone video of some of them

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend where sitting on a bench taking in the stars.
a light came ove s with no sound.
as we looked it made a "p" shape in the sky with no sound at all.
just 9 lights in a triangle shape.
it hovered for about 2 mins the shot off super speed over the tree line behind us.
10 mins later 2 jets flew past very loud and banged (im geussing breaking sound).
we saw or heard nothing else.
i mean nothing no birds or foxs etc.
its a big green belt by me,
content.summary: Made a  "p" shape silent and fled over tree line. 5 mins later 2 fighter jets came ove full mach 2

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out of my balcony at around 21.20 british summer time so it was still light, the sun wouldn't set for another 20 minutes when an extreamly bright orb in the sky grabbed my attention. it was moving left and right wiggling around as it went forward. i blinked to see if my eyes were playing tricks on my but it was still there, after only 10 seconds it either accelerated off at a speed iv never seen somthing go before or it just turned its lights off but to me it look like it was moving very very quickly away.
content.summary: Light orb moving up and down before accelerating off faster than iv ever seen anything go
